bibl.title: Reports from the Survey of the Dakhleh Oasis, Western Desert of Egypt, 1977-1987
bibl.note: Includes publications to the end of 1996.

C.S. CHURCHER and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), Reports from the Survey of the Dakhleh Oasis, Western Desert of Egypt, 1977-1987 = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 2 = Oxbow Monograph. 99 (Oxford, 1999) pp. 245-250.
